credentials.title: API CREDENTIALS MANAGEMENT
credentials.description: Manage API keys and credentials for external services

terminal.title: TERMINAL APPEARANCE
terminal.description: Customize the visual appearance of your terminal including fonts, colors, timezone, and keyboard shortcuts.
terminal.timezoneDescription: Set the default timezone displayed in the navigation bar. Dashboard widgets can use their own timezone settings.
terminal.functionKeysDescription: Configure which tab or action each function key (F1-F12) should trigger. Changes will be reflected in the status bar and keyboard shortcuts.
terminal.previewBody: Body Text: Real-time market analysis and portfolio tracking
terminal.previewSmall: Small Text: Market data, timestamps, and metadata
terminal.saveSuccess: Terminal appearance and key mappings saved successfully
terminal.resetSuccess: Reset to default appearance and key mappings

stockSymbols.title: Stock Symbol Database
stockSymbols.description: Download and manage broker symbol data for fast offline search. Symbol data includes stocks, F&O, commodities, and currency derivatives. Update regularly to get latest instruments and expiries.

terminalConfig.title: TAB LAYOUT CONFIGURATION
terminalConfig.headerTabsDesc: Drag to reorder. These tabs appear in the main header navigation.
terminalConfig.tip: TIP: Drag tabs to reorder them. Use arrow buttons to move tabs between header and menu sections. Changes are saved automatically.

footer.secureStorage: All data stored securely in fincept_terminal.db
